messages.content: Dear resident, I was born and brought up in Dumfries and Galloway and have lived in our region all my life... At the General Election in just a few weeks time, families face a big choice about the future of our region. It's a choice between a Labour Government that will fight for hardworking families, or five more years of the Tories... Only electing a Labour MP on May 7th can stop the Tories and deliver the change we need. Best wishes, Russell Brown

mentions.tacticalSituation: The election will be a close fight between Labour and the Tories. A vote for the SNP or Lib Dems or not voting at all risks letting the Tories in the back door. Electing a Tory MP will help make the Tories the largest party and help them form the next Government.

leaflet.personalStatement: I want what's best for local families. I went to our local schools and like us all, rely on our local NHS.

endorsements.endorsement: Russell Brown will be my first vote in a General Election and Iâ€™ll be voting for Russell. He focuses on what really matters to young people, which is around tackling problems like low pay.

Russell is born and bred in Dumfries and Galloway and has lived here all his life. He always stands up for local families and is a full time MP, not looking to grab a second job like some. He works tirelessly for our area and that's what we want from our MP.

I'll be backing Russell because he's our local voice who never takes our area for granted. He gets support from people across all political parties, including SNP supporters. They know only a vote for Russell will keep the Tories out in Dumfries and Galloway.

Russell has a record second to none when it comes to being a hard working local MP. He is accessible and knows his help's easy to get in touch with. Everyone knows somebody Russell has helped and he'll definitely be getting my support.
